metadata.name: Red Dreams
metadata.description:
About the project:

Augmented reality sculpture has various uses (utility), for example: 3D objects (.glb / .gltf file) that can be placed in digital galleries and museums such as oncyber.io, arium.xyz and others. 

It can be used in different NFT games, metaverse or imported into various AR mobile applications such as Artivive and Eyejack. Also, by using relevant applications, you can place it via geolocation. 

Marker tracking example: 

https://youtube.com/shorts/KHfsol5DVEo 


NFT PILLS Collection - Red Dreams: 

https://foundation.app/@BIIMO/NFTPILLS/7
